export function createRipple(event){console.log("ripppppllllee",event);var button=event.currentTarget;var circle=document.createElement("span");var diameter=Math.max(button.clientWidth,button.clientHeight);var radius=diameter/2;circle.style.width=circle.style.height="".concat(diameter,"px");circle.style.left="".concat(event.clientX-button.offsetLeft-radius,"px");circle.style.top="".concat(event.clientY+window.scrollY-button.offsetTop-radius,"px");circle.style.background="linear-gradient(to top, rgba(0,0,0,0) 0%, rgba(0,0,0,0.66) 50%, rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%)";// "radial-gradient(at top, rgba(0,0,0,1), yellow, green, blue, indigo, violet);";
circle.classList.add("ripple");console.log(event.clientX);var ripple=button.getElementsByClassName("ripple")[0];if(ripple){ripple.remove();}button.appendChild(circle);}
